sentence: The image is a screenshot of a mobile app interface focused on locating nearby takeaways.
sentence_cn: 图像是一个专注于定位附近外卖店的移动应用程序界面的屏幕截图。

sentence: - The top headline reads, "Want to see the best takeaways in your area?" in bold white letters.
sentence_cn: - 顶部标题用粗体白色字母写着“想看看你所在地区最好的外卖店吗？”。
words: Want to see the best takeaways in your area?

sentence: - Below a map, there's another message: "We need your location to find nearby takeaways," also in white letters.
sentence_cn: - 地图下方还有另一条消息：“我们需要您的位置来查找附近的外卖店”，也是用白色字母写的。
words: We need your location to find nearby takeaways,

sentence: - Map: Positioned in the center, circular in shape, showing part of an area with a blue dot indicating the user's current location.
sentence_cn: - 地图：位于中心，圆形，显示部分区域，蓝点表示用户当前位置。

sentence: Multiple red pins with white icons represent takeaway locations.
sentence_cn: 带有白色图标的多个红色图钉代表外卖位置。

sentence: - A prominent yellow button in the center bottom reads "LOCATE ME!" in black text, prompting the user to share their location.
sentence_cn: - 底部中央有一个显眼的黄色按钮，上面用黑色文字写着“找到我！”，提示用户分享他们的位置。

sentence: - Below it, there's a smaller white text option: "No, thanks."
sentence_cn: - 下面有一个较小的白色文字选项：“不，谢谢。”

sentence: - Top Bar: Shows icons for notifications, settings, and other app functionalities, along with the time "12:26".
sentence_cn: - 顶部栏：显示通知、设置和其他应用程序功能的图标，以及时间“12:26”。
